sub_title: Manufacturing Engineer at Olympus Medical UKIE
summary:
Contact: crisbaeta@gmail.com - +44 07494164214
Mechanical Engineer - Project Leader - Process / Manufacturing/ Production Engineer 

-Mechanical Engineer and Mechtronics Technician with strong experiences in Brazil, Canada, Ireland and Unted Kingdom

- Good Knowledge of Good Manufacturing Practices - GMP - developed during experience in one of the main Pharmaceutical Industries in the world.

-Strong experience in the polymer and plastic industry, above all rubber as Production Intern and Process Development Engineer in a Tyre and in a Hose factory.

- Strong immersion in the industrial environment, including the manufacturing floor in companies such ABCON IRELAND and PIRELLI TIRES BRAZIL and strong capacity to apply industrial tools. E.g: Lean Manufacturing, Kaizen, 5S - Continuous Improvement - and also KPI management.

- Successful Project Leader,able to drive industrial, automotive and cost reduction project to the success in big companies including Robert Bosch Latin America.

-Abilities on preparation and reading of engineering documents and drawers  acquired when Project Development and 3D Modeling role.

- Capacities also include qualitative and quantitative data analysis applying software such as Microsoft Office Excel, Word, Google Sheets, SAP, Autocad, SolidWorks and C/C++ programming.

school.name: Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica de Minas Gerais

awards.title: Bronze Medal
awards.issuer: OBMEP - Olimpíada Brasileira de Matemática das Escolas Públicas

projects.title: RESEARCH IN AUTOMOTIVE IMPACTS SIMULATION - UOIT UNIVERSITY
projects.description: The developed research aimed to study and analyse a  truck simulator operation in order to comprehend automotive security simulation in truck impacts. During the period it was developed also bibliographic reviews in order to gather in the academic literature references enhance comprehension in accident scenarios and their results.

contributors.headline: Manufacturing Engineer at Olympus Medical UKIE

profile_positions.description:
Fedex is one of World's leading logistics company, with a wide range of express delivery services across the Globe.

•	 Project Manager responsible for planning and engineering of Sort Technology Equipment and Systems within the Logistics Industry. 
•	Upstream tasks involved supplier management from the project conception to the installation, commissioning and control of the equipment, ensuring successful implementation of the initiative. 
•	 Project cost management and project control ensuring project feasibility since from the design phase to delivery under the determined scope. 
•	Leadership and Execution of technical Installation and commissioning activities and protocols.
•	Upstream tasks focused on the introduction of technologies for optimizing sort technology equipment.
•	 Skillful team leader - responsible for supplier management and integration with internal teams. 
•	 Flexible and adaptable, implementing projects in more than 20 different countries around the European network.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager - Industrial Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Development of processes and procedures for new product introduction working a contact point between research and development (R&D) and  the manufacturing area in order to ensure that new components design are under  companies manufacturing capabilities.
•	Upstream activities focused on supplier evaluation activities in order to ensure that controls in place and parameters inherent to good manufacturing practices (GMP) being properly implemented in order to ensure process quality and conformity related to project requirements.
•	Supplier development project supporting equipment commissioning and validation, design and introduction of processes, operator training and prototyping to ensure that the supplier quality and controls are in line with the high standards of the medical industry.
•	Manufacturing Cost Management developing and implementing  appropriate engineerig solutions according to project CAPEX and product cost target.
•	Leadership Manufacturing Engineering package for new product introduction, including validation master plan and reports, manufacturing requirements, tooling specification, PFMEA, equipment validation, prototype and equivalent production unit assembly.
•	Supplier research focused on identifying candidates capable of producing specific components for a project. Duties included price, lead time and volume negotiation. 
•	Provide manufacturing engineering expertise and knowledge in order to ensure that appropriate project decisions are taken in relation to routing, batch quantities, process risks and standard components. 
•	Producing process maps and manufacturing layouts (MS Visio ) in order to understand manufacturing needs and implement continuous improvement actions.
Key Achievements
•	Leadership of continuous improvement project focused on introducing an electronic kanban to optimise material flow withing the process flow. The aim is to reduce the stock leadtime over process phases reducing the amount of stored parts.
profile_positions.title: Research and Development Manufacturing Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Takeda is the largest Japanese pharmaceutical company with a 235-year history is among the main 15 pharmaceutical companies in the world.

Working as Process Support Engineer in order to perform problem solving and provide technical support to the production team.


•	 Leadership of a New Product Introduction (NPI) project, managing cross functional team to perform medicine production tech transfer from a Japanese site to an Irish site.
•	Work on technical, process optimization and validation studies, complete and review risk assessment and implement cost reduction actions in good manufacturing practices (GMP) and FDA regulated environment.
•	Project Lead for new equipment introduction and qualification for NPI.
•	Engage with suppliers to ensure that pharmaceutical good manufacturing practices are in place to prevent any kind of cross-contamination within one of the most critical industrial areas.
•	Introduce manufacturing instructions, generate test reports, introduce change request, review BOMs, prepare and approve protocols and support SME’s during different phases of project implementation including Technical studies, Optimization, Process Validation and Start of Production (SOP).
•	Process support engineering routine including problem solving, testing methods, investigations, troubleshooting process, root cause analysis and vendors co-ordination.
Key achievements 
•	Successfully investigated process abnormalities root causes in order to adequate the process to the control limits.
profile_positions.title: Process Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Cavmac is an Irish Industrial Rubber Hose Manufacturer producing a range of products appliedon the safe transport of a range of products including liquids in the oil and gas industries. 

•	Project Engineer duties included Leadership of a Lean Manufacturing Project and introduction of continuous improvement tools such as 5S, Kanban, and problem solving methodologies (5 whys, fishbone diagram).
•	 Quality and production management implementing visual management and performing data analysis in order to enhance productivity with no quality loss. 
•	Stakeholder management involving purchasing projects and upstream activities focused on price reduction with quality gain.
•	Lead new supplier development and introduction focused in reducing raw materials cost and gaining quality.
•	Supplier research in order to optimise current processes through the introduction 
•	Development and introduction of specific production procedures, DFM and machine optimization for rubber industrial hoses manufacturing and production.
•	 Leaded production efficiency program focused on reducing the amount of wasted textile and optimizing machine uptime in different steps of the production chain. 
Key achievements
•	Lead the replacement of raw materials by developing different suppliers in Latvia and Portugal with higher product quality and lower price. Annual Savings: 70% 

-Duties also include data collection implementing KPI management , evaluate processes to  identify potential process enhancement and cost-savings opportunities and developing ergonomic production procedures. Leadership of purchasing projects negotiating price reduction alongside with quality gain.
profile_positions.title: Process Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Pirelli is a traditional tire producer from Milan, Italy and the leader of the Brazilian market. 

Responsibilities include supervised programming and planning of  tire curing production line. Duties also include analysis and management  of production KPI. The role also includes leadership and strategic project  management on machine improvement  infrastructure project. 

During this period it was also possible to apply lean manufacturing tools, such  5S, problem solving, continuous improvement, cost and losses reduction.

•	 Supervised programming and planning of 200 autoclaves machines in the Brazil’s largest tire factory.
•	Supplier management in order to ensure the availability of materials according to the daily production forecast.
•	Statistics analysis of daily results, OEE and KPI management in order to reduce production losses and increase site efficiency.
•	Co-ordinate introduction of high technology device focused on real time curing monitoring in order to increase quality and productivity. 
•	Leadership of Machine Optimization project focused on component failure reduction leading a cross-functional team and applying problem solving methodology such as Process FMEA, DMAIC, A3, Ishikawa Diagram, 5 Whys, PDCA and 5W2Hs. 
Key achievements
•	Reduction of equipment losses from 4 to 1 per week – Annual savings: € 14T and 5S implemented in the curing production line
profile_positions.title: Production Management and Planning Intern

profile_positions.description:
Robert Bosch is one of the largest companies in the world being present in several industry segments above the automotive.

The activities consisted basically in the leadership of automotive projects by being in charge of internal strategic planning delegating tasks to the involved teams, managing KPI's and preparing presentations of project status applying software such as MS project , SAP, Excel  and PowerPoint. 
Duties include relationship management support between internal teams , leadership and development  of continuous improvement project and several follow-up on suppliers that use to require weeks of negotiation.  The main achievement was to develop a strategic planning to reduce the time gap between purchase requisition and purchase order and also between purchase order and delivery in order to produce project samples in a shorter time. Results: Reduction from 70 days to 30 days to conclude the whole process.


•	Leadership of Automotive NPI Projects from initial design to implementation and SOP.
•	KPI Management and lead cross-functional team dealing with stakeholder management, production, manufacturing and testing support, quality management and customer reports.
•	Develop a logistic network involving suppliers and cargo carriers to ensure that the upstream involving a critical part would be in place for a product launch. 
•	Lead a continuous improvement project focused on the efficiency of work flows in order to increase purchase order efficiency and improve supplier management performance. 
•	Review, design and approve automotive protocols such as APQP, PPAP and PFMEAs.
Key achievements
•	Increased work flow efficiency and reduced  Start of Production (SOP) delays by 50%.
profile_positions.title: Project Manegement Intern

profile_positions.description: Duties include development and implementation of automotive prototypes focused on energy efficiency  engineering undergraduate competitions.
profile_positions.title: Team Member

profile_positions.description: The role consisted in development and analysis of automotive projects for car manufacturers customer by applying 3D modelling software (NX-5). Project development by using  computational numerical simulation.
profile_positions.title: Product Development Intern
